campaign_goal: Attract users searching for 'ai consulting', 'ai voice agent development', and related terms to generate leads and acquire clients.
target_audience: Non-tech Small to Medium Businesses (SMBs) in sectors like Retail, Restaurants, Healthcare, Real Estate, Legal, Accounting, Local Services, Manufacturing, Education, primarily in the US (initially focusing on San Francisco and New York). Decision makers are Owners, General Managers, Operations Managers, Marketing Managers, Customer Service Managers, Office Managers, Practice Managers.
bidding_strategy: Target CPA (once we have conversion data)
